title: What is the name of that one old 70-80’s song that chants “whoa” a few times then sings about the night? - Quora

response.answer_text: From 1984, there's  "Self Control" by Laura Branigan. The relevant section of the lyrics are "Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh Oh, the night is my world City light painted girl In the day nothing matters It's the night time that flatters I, I live among the creatures of the night I haven't got the will to try and fight Against a new tomorrow, so I guess I'll just believe it That tomorrow never knows"
It’s probably Rhythm of the Night by Corona Corona - Rhythm Of The Night (1993) That seems to be the only song that fits what you describe accurately. Hopefully it’s helpful :)
